title: Enhancing Scientific Practical Competencies via Weblog-Based Reflective Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level specialized knowledge in science and practical experience
context.additional_context: Necessity of establishing reflective practice-based learning environments incorporating in-service professionals' work experiences

learning_goals: Learners systematically document work-related reflections in a weblog at least twice per week.
Learners perform peer feedback exchanges at least three times via weblog and apply the feedback to improve their work.
Learners analyze their own thinking patterns demonstrated during the scientific problem-solving process through weblog-based reflection.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
